participant_1.background:
I moved to ny to study in a prestigious designing school.
My desire is to become a fashion designer.
I love to go shopping and inspire myself in stylish stores.
My inspirations are alexander mcqueen and coco chanel.

participant_2.background:
My father was a cook.
He taught me right from wrong.
He worked hard.
He later became a bartender.

content.text: I moved to new york to study in a prestigious designing school. My desire is to become a fashion designer.
That's amazing! What made you want to become a fashion designer?
I've loved fashion since I was young. I would always watch my mother get dressed and I would dream of becoming a fashion designer when I grew up.
That's so sweet. I'm sure you'll make a great fashion designer.
Thank you! I hope so too.
So, what are some of your inspirations?
My inspirations are Alexander McQueen and Coco Chanel. I love their sense of style and their attention to detail.
Those are great choices. I love their work too.
I'm so glad! I love talking about fashion.
Me too! It's one of my favorite things to talk about.
So, what do you like to do for fun?
I like to go shopping, go to the movies, and hang out with my friends.
That sounds like fun. I like to go shopping too. I like to find new clothes and accessories.
I love finding new clothes too. It's so much fun to try on new things and see how they look on me.
Me too! I love trying on new things and seeing how they look on me.
I'm glad we have something in common.
Me too! I think we're going to be great friends.
